    3. What is the maximum size of a BLOB field?

      2 gigabytes

      1 gigabyte

      4 gigabytes

    4. What method is used to download a file from a stream in Business Central?

      File.ExportFromStream

      File.DownloadFromStream

      File.Download

      File.DownloadStreamToDisk
